How do I use the Verus API to retrieve all currencies that have less than 1000 VRSC in reserve?

The Verus API actually retrieves all currencies that have **at least** 1000 VRSC in reserve, not less than. Additionally, the currencies must also have a reserve ratio greater than 10% VRSC and have all listed currencies as reserves.

verters` API retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are greater than 10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
```
Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
